alert.note: Alert for Greene; Jasper; Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 6:48AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Morgan, northwestern Greene, northeastern Jasper and east central Newton Counties through 715 AM EST... At 648 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Brick Store to near Farrar to Calvin, and moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Madison, Rutledge, Newborn, Buckhead, Farrar, Swords, Wrayswood, Godfrey, Greshamville and Apalachee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for central, north central and east central Georgia.
